welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Hayling, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonderful things our town has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Goodwood Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Southampton Airport is used for overflow and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shoreham Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Shoreham Airport is used for private and recreational flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
